

... ip calculator

root@deb-7:~# ipcalc -n 192.168.179.0/24
Address:   192.168.179.0        11000000.10101000.10110011. 00000000
Netmask:   255.255.255.0 = 24   11111111.11111111.11111111. 00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.0.255            00000000.00000000.00000000. 11111111
=>
Network:   192.168.179.0/24     11000000.10101000.10110011. 00000000
HostMin:   192.168.179.1        11000000.10101000.10110011. 00000001
HostMax:   192.168.179.254      11000000.10101000.10110011. 11111110
Broadcast: 192.168.179.255      11000000.10101000.10110011. 11111111
Hosts/Net: 254                   Class C, Private Internet

root@deb-7:~# ipcalc -n 192.168.179.0/23
Address:   192.168.179.0        11000000.10101000.1011001 1.00000000
Netmask:   255.255.254.0 = 23   11111111.11111111.1111111 0.00000000
Wildcard:  0.0.1.255            00000000.00000000.0000000 1.11111111
=>
Network:   192.168.178.0/23     11000000.10101000.1011001 0.00000000
HostMin:   192.168.178.1        11000000.10101000.1011001 0.00000001
HostMax:   192.168.179.254      11000000.10101000.1011001 1.11111110
Broadcast: 192.168.179.255      11000000.10101000.1011001 1.11111111
Hosts/Net: 510                   Class C, Private Internet

root@deb-7:~#
